ComicInfo.Summary:
M.O.D.O.K. MEETS HIS MAKER!
M.O.D.O.K.'s search for answers about the mysterious memories of a family plaguing him have lead him straight into the arms of his creator will this reunion see M.O.D.O.K. welcomed with open arms or leave him staring down the barrel at his own demise? Only one way to find out, True Believerus, you won't want to miss out on this explosive series finale!!!

ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 4: Prime Directive
